title: 任务新人贴
author: 咸鱼威
txt_content: 我是大家好，我是咸鱼，第一天来到mcbbs，请大家多多指教

replies.author: Milim_Nava
replies.txt_content: 欢迎新人 多看版规少吃亏

replies.author: 白焰BaiYan
replies.txt_content: 欢迎萌新，不要当咸鱼，论坛很有意思的

replies.author: Iris72
replies.txt_content: 欢迎新人注意不要违反班规哦

replies.author: NONGFUSPRLNGL
replies.txt_content: 欢迎新人，请多多注意版规

replies.author: RanEr5438
replies.txt_content: 欢迎新人，请多多注意版规

replies.author: Iris72
replies.txt_content: 欢迎新人祝你度过愉快的一天

replies.author: liyangstat
replies.txt_content: 欢迎新人加入mcbbs 发帖注意看版规

replies.author: wangzian233
replies.txt_content: 你想快点升级就去问答办吧
